abilities.name: The Reaping
abilities.description: Regains a portion of all damage done to heroes as health

abilities.name: Hellfire Shotguns
abilities.description: Reaper tears enemies apart with twin shotguns.

abilities.name: Wraith Form
abilities.description: Reaper becomes a shadow for a short period of time. While in this form, he takes no damage and is able to pass through enemies, but cannot fire his weapons or use other abilities. Cannot be activated while affected by mobility-locking effects.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: After marking a destination, Reaper disappears and reappears at that location. Reaper is invisible while exiting

abilities.name: Death Blossom
abilities.description: In a blur of motion, Reaper empties both hellfire shotguns at breakneck speed, dealing massive damage to all nearby enemies.
